content: When Scrooge awoke, it was so dark, that looking out of bed, he could scarcely distinguish the transparent window from the opaque walls of his chamber.
translations: ita:Quando Scrooge si svegliò, era così buio, che guardando fuori dal letto, riusciva a malapena distinguere la finestra tra
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
